segments.title: From Hype to Public Policy
segments.subtitle: How to Govern AI in the Public Sector
bullets: Artificial intelligence has moved from being a technological promise to becoming an everyday tool for governments and public administrations
The speed of its adoption exceeds institutional capacity to regulate, evaluate, and ensure alignment with the public interest
We will explore how States can govern AI from three dimensions: strategic, operational, and ethical
Drawing from international and Latin American experiences, we will present guidelines for responsible governance
A critical journey towards sustainable public policies in the age of artificial intelligence

engagement.prompt: How is your organization currently approaching AI governance?

segments.notes: Professional opening slide. Carlos Denner, August 14. International conference. Establish credibility and academic context. Three dimensions: strategic, operational, ethical.
